title: Clarify Project Goals
text: Ensure the design team is aware of the project's objectives and desired outcomes. This helps align their work with the overall strategy.

title: Regular Check-ins
text: Schedule regular meetings to discuss progress and address any concerns or questions the design team might have.

title: Provide Constructive Feedback
text: Offer feedback that is specific and actionable to help the design team improve their work and meet expectations.

title: Effective Communication
text: What is a key method to ensure the design team understands your expectations?
